experience: You and Deepak both know Mark Casey, PMP, CSM, Roy Eubanks, and 5 others
The Demise of the Jet Airways Customer Experience
I hired an UNEMPLOYED with a very long EMPLOYMENT gap, 12 years.
She was a stay-home mom whose 4 children grew up.
Of 1250 people that I hired this was the longest gap. The next one down was someone with a 5 year gap. He took time off to take care of his ailing parents and their family business.
In both cases, nobody else wanted to hire them other than for minimum wage jobs.
The lady heads up a major HR function now.
A parenthood is a perfect experience for an HR person.
The gentleman is a software developer with a big name Internet company. He kept his skills current during the break.
The only thing that matters is the ability to do the job.
We should put aside all prejudice, all dogmas, all nonsense "common sense".
And simply hire best people for the job.
View my verified achievement on Acclaim.
recommendations: January 12, 2017, Deepak reported directly to Rahul

I had pleasure working with Rahul at GEP solutions. He understands complex technologies and is able to creatively present them in a simple, engaging manner. Rahul has always executed at a high standard with enthusiasm and commitment.You could always count on Rahul for his judgment during the crucial times of a project. As a leader, Rahul earns my highest recommendation.

summary: Results-oriented software professional with extensive experience in Microsoft technologies. Implemented various business systems in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) which includes User Interaction, Requirement Gathering, Design/Architect, Development, Integration, Planning and management of Builds, Configuration, Code Management, Production Support, Maintenance, Testing, Implementation and Documentation.I am quick learner and love to work on new technologies. Always look for improvement in existing software and try to make it better. As a lead, I always try to keep team motivated towards continued success of project. Specialties: Enterprise Software, .Net, MVC, WCF (SOAP), WebApi (REST), HTML, SPLUNK, RabbitMQ, MSMQ, SQL Server, Aerospike (NoSql), DevOps, Bamboo, Jenkins, Git, Bitbucket, TFS, Agile (Scrum), Waterfall methodology.
